description: aws lamda serverless application that uses puppeteer
app_features: uses serverless framework to handle aws lambda
automatically deploy in every github push
project_features: code formatting and linting provided by [prettier](https://github.com/prettier/prettier), [eslint](https://github.com/eslint/eslint) and [lintstaged](https://github.com/okonet/lint-staged)
commit messages linting controlled by [commitlint](https://github.com/conventional-changelog/commitlint) and [commitzen](https://github.com/commitizen/cz-cli)
util script to show all available commit types, you can use it by running the `commit` package.json script

commands.description: Run the project in development mode
Compiles the code into production mode
deploy the project to amazom aws lambda

resources: [Puppeteer on AWS Lambda in May of 2022](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZEEvC-oW8c)
